page.title: 19 R.A.F.Mildenhall Air Show
page.content: The major annual event that takes place in the area is the Air Fete, when for two days people arrive from all over the United Kingdom and from overseas to see the spectacular air displays and static exhibitions at R.A.F. Mildenhall.The number of visitors increases annually and with 300,000 people arriving and departing in cars and coaches,major traffic problems arise for miles around our area, which becomes the centre of attraction. Static displays of R.A.F.and U.S.A.F. aircraft,armaments and other equipment are on view to the public. The Flying Displays are spectacular, lasting for over 3 hours.Aircraft from many nations demonstrate their aerobatic skills and speed.The show includes the Battle of Britain Flight and the highlight is the performance of the R.A.F.Red Arrows.
